Text: a collection of malayalam film songs from 1960 to 2000. only hits and famous songs are included. tried to include maximum details movie name, singer etc for each song. songs are classified into various decades and into male, female and duets.rnif any problem feel free to contact newuploaders@gmail.com

@uploaders: the collection of the songs are good but the sound is sometimes very choppy and sound like recorded from a mobile or TV device...

Anyways, thanks buddy...
